name: Fish Fighter (MysticDolphin)
description:
remember this while playing: THIS IS A VERY EARLY DEMO!!!!! AND THE GAME IS NOT FINISHED!!!!!!!

How To Play: 

Player 1 - A Move Left, D Move Right, S+(A or D) light attack, W Heavy Attack            Player 2 - LeftArrow Move Left, RightArrow Move Right, DownArrow+(Left or Right) light attack, UpArrow Heavy Attack

Menu - Space to start game, S to switch player 1 character, downarrow to switch player 2 character. when switching characters you have to type the name ID of the character

Characters

- "Basic" The Default Character

- "Sword" a Slower but Stronger Character (While doing a heavy attack you can move)

- More Characters in develpment
